segments.text: I see the boy struggling to balance on that stool, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on those cookies, just like his mother with her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, but I can see the anticipation in her eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water overflowing, and it's making me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in a puddle, and she doesn't even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really do something about this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and inviting, unlike the chaos in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how unaware everyone is of the potential dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching his limits to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the stool will hold or if he'll take a tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR
